scripts.ico: cd public/img/icons; for size in 16 24 32 48 57 60 64 76 96 120 128 144 150 152 180 192 195 196 228 270 512 558; do convert jaredhome-icon-source.png -resize ${size}x${size}\! jaredhome-icon-${size}.png; optipng -clobber -quiet jaredhome-icon-${size}.png; done; convert jaredhome-icon-16.png jaredhome-icon-32.png jaredhome-favicon.ico; cp -f jaredhome-icon-192.png android-chrome-192x192.png; cp -f jaredhome-icon-512.png android-chrome-512x512.png; cp -f jaredhome-icon-120.png apple-touch-icon-120x120.png; cp -f jaredhome-icon-152.png apple-touch-icon-152x152.png; cp -f jaredhome-icon-180.png apple-touch-icon-180x180.png; cp -f jaredhome-icon-60.png apple-touch-icon-60x60.png; cp -f jaredhome-icon-60.png apple-touch-icon-76x76.png; cp -f jaredhome-icon-180.png apple-touch-icon.png; cp -f jaredhome-icon-16.png favicon-16x16.png; cp -f jaredhome-icon-32.png favicon-32x32.png; cp -f jaredhome-icon-144.png msapplication-icon-144x144.png; cp -f jaredhome-icon-150.png mstile-150x150.png; cp -f jaredhome-favicon.ico ../../favicon.ico
